question: What does M.P.P stand for?
possible_answers: A. Member of the Provincial Parachute
B. Member of the Provincial Police
C. Member of the Provincial Parliament
D. Member of the Provincial Publication
answer: C. Member of the Provincial Parliament
explanatory_sentence: The members of the legislature are called members of the Legislative Assembly (MLAs), members of the National Assembly (MNAs), members of the Provincial Parliament (MPPs) or members of the House of Assembly (MHAs), depending on the province or territory.
